title: Mage / AFK (~35)
comment_one:
*1 = As much as you need to reach the farthest monster zone. Your goal is to reach Crabcakes to choose your subclass. For gaining levels, Sticks is a great farming zone.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Overclocked Energy"
comment_two: Level "Power Overwhelming" to 50, then your active damage skills. Excess points can be used to level "Power Overwhelming" past 50
notes: That's how your build should roughly look when pushing for subclass.
